description: Try our easy to follow Choc-Mint Bombe Alaska recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Choc-Mint Bombe Alaska Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1L mint with cookies ice cream, slightly softened

recipeInstructions.text: Separate sponge cakes and place 1 of the cakes on a baking tray (freeze remaining cake for another time). Freeze for 20 minutes or until cold. Scoop ice cream on top of cake, shaping into a dome. Return to freezer for 30 minutes or until cold and firm.

Place egg whites, sugar and cream of tartar in a heatproof bowl over a saucepan of simmering water, taking care base of bowl does not touch water. Stir for 5 minutes or until sugar dissolves and mixture becomes hot or reaches 72Â°C on a sugar thermometer. Transfer mixture to an electric mixer and beat for 10 minutes or until cool and a thick glossy meringue forms.
Completely cover ice cream and cake with meringue, forming swirls and peaks. Using a kitchen blowtorch, caramelise meringue. Serve immediately.
